text: The Darlington trolleybus system once served the town of Darlington, County Durham, England. Opened on , it replaced the Darlington Corporation Light Railways tramway network. By the standards of the various now-defunct trolleybus systems in the United Kingdom, the Darlington system was a moderately sized one, with a total of 5 routes, and a maximum fleet of 66 trolleybuses. It was closed relatively early, on . None of the former Darlington trolleybuses are recorded as having been preserved. ==See also== *Transport in Darlington *List of trolleybus systems in the United Kingdom == References == === Notes === === Further reading === * ==External links== *National Trolleybus Archive *British Trolleybus Society, based in Reading *National Trolleybus Association, based in London Category:Transport in Darlington Darlington Darlington
title: Trolleybuses in Darlington
